body_html:
We do actually have something like that running internally, to help us shrink the binary footprint. It relies on some features of our internal build system though, so we'll need to do a little work to get it into the public repo. It's something we're hoping to get done though.

I'll close this bug for now, since it sounds like the original issue is resolved?

body:
We do actually have something like that running internally, to help us shrink the binary footprint. It relies on some features of our internal build system though, so we'll need to do a little work to get it into the public repo. It's something we're hoping to get done though.

I'll close this bug for now, since it sounds like the original issue is resolved?
